subject: Add AI preferences and restructure documentation
body:
- Move preferences section to top of CLAUDE.md for AI assistants
- Create docs/ folder with SESSION_NOTES.md, TODO.md, HISTORY.md
- Move detailed implementation phases to docs/IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md
- Streamline CLAUDE.md to focus on project overview and key decisions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Add AI preferences and restructure documentation
